cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Oversight and Reform on July 20, 2021.
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 4469, AI in Counterterrorism Oversight Enhancement Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 125 (Friday, July 16, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. CAROLYN B. MALONEY of New York:
H.R. 4469.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8
[Page H3633]

latestAction.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
